OOC: I copied and pasted Kyle Stewart's post below. I marked it with red an=
d bold.


______________________________________________


My messages have=
n't been getting through so:

1.Mustex and Stallex
Location:Northern Chad
S=
tatus:Traveling
Destination:Egypt
ETA:22 hours

 Mustex and Stallex duel. T=
heir double-bladed swords
slice the air. It is
sparring, but one mistake st=
ill means death. Stallex
is by far the more
talented fighter, but he can no=
t match his father in
strength and speed, so
Mustex continues pushing Stall=
ex back. Mustex gets a
good blow to Stallex's
chest. Stallex buckles under =
the pain.
Mustex:Why did you stop?
Stallex:It hurts.
Mustex:Don't stop. If =
you don't give into the pain it
will hurt 10 times
more. If you give into t=
he pain you're enemy will see
that it hurts 100 times
more. I've seen alot =
of bots fall from that mistake.
Alot of bots wouldn't
have bothered teachin=
g you that. Now back to beast
mode.
Stallex:Beast Mode!
Mustex:Beast Mode!
=
Stallex:Internal repairs.
 They begin to run off. The two horses run quickl=
y
over the desert.
Stallex:What's our next mission.
Mustex:Yours is in "Tra=
ining City". There's a monkey
there named Rhesus. He's
an old friend and he=
 can teach you about stealth.
Stallex:What about you?
Mustex:I have a plan =
to take out the "Iron Fist", but
it's a 1 bot job.
Stallex:You know how dan=
gerous that is.
Mustex:Yes but  it's even harder for 2 bots to
infiltrate. =
I have a shot
alone though.
Stallex:O.k., but come back alive. I want to be=
 the
one to beat you.
 They run off on their way to Egypt.

2.Mustex and St=
allex
Location:Training City,Egypt
Status:Preparation

 Mustex and Stallex =
walk into a room. Rhesus is
sitting at a desk with his
back to them. He is =
leaning over some circuits
examining them. Mustex has his
hands behind his =
back and is wearing his poker face.
He knows the following
conversation wil=
l be a simple matter of wearing down
Rhesus who is completely
oblivious to =
them.
Mustex:Rhesus!
 Rhesus jumps. Mustex walks around in front of him.
Mu=
stex:Still wasting precious Maximal computer space
on your own private
casi=
no my,my,my. Stallex go start training with
drones,Rhesus will be with
you =
soon.
 Stallex walks out.
Rhesus:Ahh,my good friend. So the "Carnitrons" ri=
se
again. I can hear the cry
"Carnitrons Carnivate". We were the only sensi=
ble
group. We had a simple
motto of "stay alive".
Mustex:Shutup! If we were=
 so great then why did I lead
us to get ambushed by
the "Alliance" for our =
first battle. As I recall 5 of
the 7 of us were
damaged beyond repair. Now =
I see that anything except
a 2-way war leads to
extra senseless casulties. =
That's why I intend to make
everyone pick Maximal
or Predicon. All you can =
think about is revenge on the
"Alliance",and the
rebirth of a lost cause. A=
ll I want is these parts and
a transport.
 Mustex hands Rhesus a paper. Rhe=
sus looks upset as he
reads it.
Rhesus:Where am I going to get a D.N.A. sim=
ulator.
Mustex:You're a bigger fool than I thought if you
think I don't kno=
w where
Fox Fingers got his.
Rhesus:Even so it will take me several weeks, =
but pay
could speed me up.
Mustex:Did I mention I'm planning to take out th=
e
"Iron Fist" the Alliance
will be permantly crippled.
Rhesus:Well in that =
case just let me step into the
next toom to get what you
need. So,we can fi=
nally get revenge for Croctas,
Kangato, Tigecs, Socrow, and
my lovely Monke=
ssa. I've just finished about half a
dozen special
hover-cycles. They shoul=
d do fine for you.
Mustex:Oh, and by the way I told my son you'd train
him.=

Rhesus:Small price to pay. Does he know about the
"Carnitrons" yet.
Mustex=
:Not a clue.
Rhesus:Don't worry I won't snich 'till you come to
your senses=
.
 Rhesus hands Mustex a large box of parts and walks
away to train Stallex=
.

3.Mustex
Location:Training City,Egypt
Status:Traveling
Destination:Allia=
nce Island,Spain
ETA:5 hours

Rhesus:Come back alive. You know I can't rest=
art the
"Carnitrons" without
you.
Mustex:You're not going to resart them wi=
th or without
me.
Rhesus:I'll take good care of the kid... Uh,that is
until=
 you get back.
Mustex:bye
 Mustex jumps onto his waiting hover-cycle and ra=
ces
off.

4.Mustex
Location:Alliance Island, Spain
Status:Infiltration

 Mu=
stex looks at the newly completed drone in front of
him. He activates
the D=
.N.A. simulator. The drone takes on his
appearance. He is positioned 500
ya=
rds from the "Iron Fist" so the Alliance won't risk
an attack unless he
get=
s closer. He activates another pocket sized drone.
It begins its mission
to=
 plant a device he had built 100 yards from the
base, 40 feet under. When
h=
is monitor says the drone is done he calls out the
code that will activate
=
the drones programming.
Mustex:Beast Mode!
 Mustex turns on his jammer and =
attaches it to his
belt. The drone begins
transmitting a Maximal  frequency=
,goes to Beast
Mode,and bounds for the base.
Mustex keeps low to the ground=
 so he won't be spotted.
The auto-guns begin
firing, but no transformers co=
me out. The horse jumps
away from every shot.
He stops at 100 yards away.
D=
rone:Mustex Maximize!
 The drone transforms and begins firing arrows at the=

shield of the base. He
dodges all the beams,but only has enough power at t=
his
kind of level for 15
minutes. Fortunately,he doesn't need that long. Th=
e
main turrets fireand take
him out. The shields flicker from power loss,bu=
t stay
intact. Mustex then
smiles when his monitor shows the pocket sized d=
rone
the pocket sized drone
has reached the surface. He activates the devic=
e and
it transmites a Maximal
frequency. The drone then starts firing. It h=
as enough
power for 6 shots. The
"Alliance" is beginning to sweat. The main=
 turret
fires again and the shield
goes down. Mustex deactivates th device =
and charges.
Mustex:Beast Mode!
 As he charges he scans the base. The shiel=
ds will be
down for the next hour.
It will be down for the next hour. It wi=
ll take him 10
minutes to navigate
the corridors to his destination and 10 =
minutes to get
back. He will go in
the  one way they won't expect,The Front=
 Door, 10
yards away he transforms.
Mustex:Mustex Maximize!
 Mustex draws a=
 cyber arrow and blows the door open.
Using his frequency
jammer as cover h=
e sneaks to his destination. He walks
into the Energon
storage room. The En=
ergon will magnify the explosion
of the small explosive
he made. He walks o=
ver to a computer console and hooks
it up to the
"Alliance" network. If a r=
emote connection is placed
on it it will blow from
2 connections to the net=
work. It can detect the
Energon and will blow if much
is removed. It can de=
tect the energon in the room and
will blow if to much is
removed. It takes =
20 minutes to diffuse and it would
be set for 15. There is
no deactivation =
code. The full blast could probably
not be contained. Even if
the explosive=
 is covered an electronic signal will
ignite the energon. He set
it and ran=
 out.

            CHECK! Your move Zardus(feel free to
             head f=
or your time machine this
              qualifies as a catastophe).

______=
